rules_text:
Reach
Whenever Star-Studded Sagittaur deals combat damage to a player, you may bless target land. [i](Create a token copy of this creature’s blessing attached to that permanent.)[/i]
rules_text2:
[i](You may also cast this side from your hand.)[/i]
Enchant land
Enchanted land has “{T}: Add {G}{G}.”
